chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
hello
hey pal! i'm at the start point
Puedo ver una ramita a mi izquierda que conduce a una pequeña isla con un tigre. ¿hacia dónde debo dirigirme?
what do you need to do and how can i help yo u?
well, i need to get to the treasure
i'm seeing a few islands and some animals. where should i go?
you have to first go to the tiger island opposite you
alright! i've crossed over to the island with the tiger
¿Adónde vamos ahora, amigo?
and further cross to the island of the parrot and the elephant
aha! i've hopped over to the giant island with the parrot and the big ol' elephant
what's next, buddy?
now in between the parrot and elephant, navigage your way between them then cross to the frog island
done, i'm amongst the noisy parrot and the majestic elephant
Ahora salté hacia la isla de la rana. ¿Cuál es el siguiente paso, amigo?
now cross to the frog island
done! i've hopped over to the frog island
what's the next move?
cross the crocodile lake to the girraffe island
wow, that was scary but i did it! i've made it to the island with the giraffe
¿Qué sigue en nuestra aventura?
now cross over to the snake island and you would get your treasure
yikes, snakes! alright, i've made it to snake island
now locate the treasure
ah, i've found it! so, the treasure was two steps east of the snake
*finalizado*
hola, you ready?
yeah!
awesome! first, head a few steps west, right below the wooden bench. from there, cross the trail toward the florist stand
¡pero no llegues hasta el final! en su lugar, haz un rápido giro de 180 grados y vuelve a cruzar el sendero hacia nuestro amigo perrito.
ive done that, what next ?
good job! now, turn south and cross over the branch
continue heading down until you hit another cute white dog chilling next to a picnic blanket
done that too, what next?
awesome! next, you're going to stroll on over that picnic blanket, just touching a bowl of berries
luego continúa hacia el oeste. ¡Lo estás haciendo genial!
im here buddy, what next?
great going! now, find that wooden branch and get ready to cross the river again, this time heading north
what nexr
once you're across, you'll spot a green bush
¡no lo toques! en su lugar, simplemente dale un círculo amplio en el lado derecho hasta llegar al puesto de floristería.
yeah, what next?
well done! now, gently make a left turn passing under the stand
you're heading west
next?
good going! now, carry on until you reach a big bridge with a couple of bike riders
Sigue avanzando hacia el oeste, pasando el puente.
ive seen them, what next?
you're almost there! just past the bridge, you'll see two elderly people reading newspapers on a bench
head south a few steps between them and a wooden branch
next?
at the end of the branch, you'll see a green bush
dirígete hacia ese arbusto. ¡Ahí tienes!
seen it what next?
great! now you have to go east, between the branch and the bush
next
perfect! just a few more steps to the east and you're there! you will see something interesting!
i see it
awesome! that's our final stop, the brown young deer
Has hecho un trabajo increíble navegando. ¡Qué gran cosa, amigo!
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
can we begin ?
absolutely! i'm at the tent up north
which way should i head from here?
head south over to the dog
okay, made it to the dog
ahora a donde?
take the path right after the dog and make your way to the camp fire east
alright, i'm at the campfire
where to next, buddy?
take the path south east of the camfire all the way to the telescope
got it, at the telescope now
¿Dónde sigue?
now to your west move along until you meet the house
ok, i'm at the house
we did it! *finished*
hola, q tal? ready to start?
yes
awesome! step under the first palm tree, moving south-west
luego gire a la derecha, pasando el segundo árbol. Ahora gira bruscamente a la izquierda antes del tercer árbol y continúa hacia el sur.
next?
you got it! now, sidestep to the left of the brown puppy nearby and then sort of veer to the right, heading south
keep going!
done that, next?
alright! now navigate between the two rocks, big one on your west, small one on your east, towards the water
no te asustes, todavía no te mojarás
im between them now
cool! enter the water and approach the large, red crab. now turn right and move along the big rock
keep heading west in the water. you're doing great!
next?
Rema alrededor de una tercera roca de tamaño mediano hasta que veas un tiburón. ¡No te preocupes, es amigable! luego, gire bruscamente a la derecha
english please
sure! head around a third, medium-sized rock until you see a shark
don't worry, he's friendly! then, make a sharp turn to the right
made the turn next?
awesome! now cross back to land, between the medium rock and a blue-yellow-white ball
continuar hacia el norte
done that next?
great job! now veer a bit to the left and continue northwest, taking a path between a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right
that was hard but ive done it, next buddy
you're doing amazing! make a semi-circle around the tent and keep walking south towards the sea again
¡pero espera! ¡No llegues al agua todavía!
next
right before you reach the water, turn right and walk below a red kayak
keep going, you're super close!
im there
awesome work! finally, turn a sharp right, move along that kayak until you reach a cute small green bush
¿entiendo?
